name: Kübler Ct.
description:
Kübler Ct. is a short horror game about exploring a dream-like cul-de-sac trying to find your way out. You explore different houses trying to stay safe from what you find inside. You are not entirely powerless however as you have the ability to use the blueprints of these houses to move objects and protect yourself.

Game made by Team Aquarium Gravel for IM 389:

M McKeever - Producer

Justin Clemens - Lead Designer

Anthony Drapeau - Lead Programmer

Casey Vande Hey - Programmer and Designer

Alex Gruber - Artist
